docs.lead_paragraph: Holistic medicine is dear to the heart of William Stern, the head of New York's Urban Development Corporation. He believes it is ''going to be an important area of high-tech growth. I'm interested in the state and the U.D.C. helping out.''

headline.main: The Editorial Notebook; The Hole in Holistic Medicine

docs.snippet: Holistic medicine is dear to the heart of William Stern, the head of New York's Urban Development Corporation. He believes it is ''going to be an important area of high-tech growth. I'm interested in the state and the U.D.C. helping out.''
